spec_data.Name: fmt
spec_data.Description:
C++ Format is an open-source formatting library for C++. It can be used as a
safe alternative to printf or as a fast alternative to IOStreams.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 12 Aug 2017 10:22:49 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Small, safe and fast formatting library for C++
